activity_differential: child riding in crate while adults interact
description: A group of people, including adults and children, are shopping in a supermarket aisle. One adult pushes a shopping cart, a child sits in a crate, and another adult and child join them. The camera remains stationary, capturing the progression of the group as they move and interact.
